# commonmetar

<!-- badges: start -->
[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/maelle/commonmetar/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/maelle/commonmetar/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of commonmetar is to allow rOpenSci blog editors to generate a random DOI strings for rOpenSci blog posts, that [Rogue Scholar](https://rogue-scholar.org/) will then use for registration.

## Setup

You can install the development version of commonmetar from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("ropensci-org/commonmetar")
```

Install commonmetar with 

``` r
commonmetar::commonmeta_install()
``` 

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(commonmetar)
commonmeta_doi()
```
